categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker voice actors

nodes.text: Reginald Lucien Frank Roger Watts (born March 23, 1972) is an American comedian and musician who voiced Landonis Balthazar Calrissian in his disguise in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is known for appearing on the television series Comedy Bang! Bang! and for leading the house band of the talk show The Late Late Show with James Corden.
